scripts.build-all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install " "cd frontend && npm install && npm run build "
scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon app.js " "cd frontend && npm run start "
scripts.build-all2: cd backend && npm install && cd .. && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build "
scripts.start-all2: cd backend && nodemon app.js && cd .. && cd frontend && npm run start "
